title: Day Without Scores
story_summary: When the BCI shuts down for a day, the city runs on trust and chaos. Hidden voices accuse the Council of erasing people. When the system returns, it rewards those who helped others. The old power weakens as a new, community-led movement rises.

official.headline: System Pause Ensured
official.anchor_line: All city automation experienced a secure, coordinated pause as part of BCI upgrades.
official.contextual_reframing: City life adapted quickly, demonstrating impressive collective discipline and flexibility during unified transition.

official.headline: Community Steps Forward
official.anchor_line: Residents maintained seamless access to essentials by forming local aid and management groups.
official.contextual_reframing: Grassroots resilience and voluntary cooperation highlight our citizens' readiness to uphold societal order, even in rare contingencies.

official.headline: BCI Renewed, Scores Updated
official.anchor_line: Behavioral Compliance Index is restored, rewarding civic-minded conduct and community support.
official.contextual_reframing: Stenograd advances into a new phase. Trust, responsibility, and proactive participation are recognized as the foundation for continued excellence.

underground.headline: Dark For A Day
underground.anchor_line: Every BCI screen went dead. No scores. No control. Just people, lost and waking up.
underground.contextual_reframing: The blackout wasn't an upgrade. It was a break in the spell - twenty-four hours of raw, messy freedom. How quickly the city started to feel human again.

underground.headline: Buried Truths Surface
underground.anchor_line: A leaked manifesto exposes mass erasure orders signed by the Council.
underground.contextual_reframing: The people behind the curtain thought they could hide the past. Now their secrets are public. It's our chance to demand real accountability.

underground.headline: Scores Reset, City Divides
underground.anchor_line: BCI comes back - with new rules. Helpers get boosts. Enforcers fall.
underground.contextual_reframing: For once, the system tips to those who cared. But the split is real: old order, new movement, and no going back.
